scenarios.title: Lost Laptop with PHI
scenarios.description: A staff laptop containing PHI is lost on public transit.
scenarios.question: What is the immediate step?

options.C: Report immediately to the Privacy Officer and IT

scenarios.explanation: Immediate reporting initiates containment and required assessments.

scenarios.title: Unauthorized Access Detected
scenarios.description: Logs show an account accessing records outside their role.
scenarios.question: What should occur first?

options.B: Revoke access and investigate within 24 hours

scenarios.explanation: Containment and investigation are part of incident response.

scenarios.title: Role Change
scenarios.description: An employee moves from finance to a program role but retains broad system access.
scenarios.question: What should happen?

options.C: Update RBAC permissions to least privilege for the new role

scenarios.explanation: Access should reflect current responsibilities and least privilege.
